li.stringvalue: <?xml version="1.0"?> <account name="psp@touk.pl" uid="1182791050.3299.20@psp" enabled="true"><identity><name>Piotr Stepaniak</name><addr-spec>psp@touk.pl</addr-spec><signature uid=""/></identity><source save-passwd="true" keep-on-server="false" auto-check="false" auto-check-timeout="10"><url>imap://piotrs@touk.pl/;command=ssh%20-C%20-l%20%25u%20%25h%20exec%20/usr/sbin/imapd;use_ssl=when-possible</url></source><transport save-passwd="true"><url>smtp://piotrs;auth=PLAIN@touk.pl/;use_ssl=when-possible</url></transport><drafts-folder>mbox:/home/piotrs/.evolution/mail/local#Drafts</drafts-folder><sent-folder>mbox:/home/piotrs/.evolution/mail/local#Sent</sent-folder><auto-cc always="false"><recipients></recipients></auto-cc><auto-bcc always="false"><recipients></recipients></auto-bcc><receipt-policy policy="never"/><pgp encrypt-to-self="false" always-trust="false" always-sign="false" no-imip-sign="false"/><smime sign-default="false" encrypt-default="false" encrypt-to-self="false"/></account>
